segments.text: Mom . I have to go school shopping . There's only one more week left .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Do you need money or what ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I have this list of stuff that I need and I only have half the dough .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Half the dough huh . Well . How would you like to earn the other half ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do I have a choice ? Uh . That's a no . What can I do ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I thought you'd never ask . The lawn needs to be mowed and the garage deserves to be cleaned .
segments.speaker: S2
